content:
Menu
 Developer Portal

Are you joining from FedEx Web Services? Welcome!

Starting on August 31, 2024, you will no longer be able to use FedEx Web Services Tracking, Address Validation, and Validate Postal Codes. This is because SOAP based FedEx Web Services is now in development containment and has been replaced with FedEx RESTful APIs. You can learn more about how to upgrade your integration to FedEx APIs here on the FedEx Developer Portal.

Your business, powered by FedEx

Our shipping integration solutions help connect your current business application with FedEx logistic solutions.


With a full suite of modern APIs and our Shipment Visibility Webhook, we have software solutions to support all your needs.
It’s your business. Done better.

SIGN UP LOG IN
Get near real-time Shipment Visibility Webhook

FedEx Shipment Visibility Webhook delivers near real-time tracking push notifications directly to your servers. You get timely shipment visibility and best-in-class recipient tracking  - with a flexible solution you can configure to meet your unique business needs. Subscribers are charged a monthly fee, based on the count of tracking number(s). 

EXPLORE THE BENEFITS
No matter your needs, our solutions deliver

FedEx APIs and webhooks offer a simple, cost-effective way to keep customers on your site and add speed and efficiency to your shipping process.

Streamline processes
Access customized, interface-independent integration solutions.
Improve efficiency
Manage returns with ease and reduce customer service costs.
Support customers
Allow customers to track the status of their orders, all in your own application.
Leverage FedEx solutions with our full suite of webhooks and APIs
APIs

Pull information from FedEx logistic solutions into your own applications to compare rates, create labels, process returns, and more. 

MOST POPULAR APIS

• Track API

• Ship API

• Rate and transit time

EXPLORE API CATALOG
Shipment Visibility Webhook

Get near real time push updates on shipments in transit for US-based accounts and tracking numbers . Track events include estimated date of delivery and time window, picture proof of delivery and more. Subscribers are charged a monthly fee, based on the count of tracking number(s).





COMING SOON

Tracking number-based webhooks
